title: Pool View, 4 Swimming Pools and 3 Spas, Air Conditioning
posting_body: ['WELCOME TO THE MET', 'Experience a beautiful apartment community with relaxed living in the northwest side of Las Vegas, Nevada.', 'Experience spacious apartments that are minutes from the Las Vegas Strip, surrounded by accessible transportation links, dining, entertainment, and shopping.', 'Our prime location and on-site amenities will offer you the very best living, whether you are barbecuing with your neighbors or taking a cool dip in our swimming pool.', 'Get in touch with The Met apartments today to schedule an appointment and tour.', 'We look forward to meeting you!', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 58', 'OR Text', '58', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text with us.', 'Need more information?', 'Copy this link:', '<URL>', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 986 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Custom Cabinetry', '- Fireplaces*', '- Courtyard', '- Walk-in Closets', '- Private Balcony/Patio', '- Vaulted Ceilings*', '- Air Conditioning', '- Upgraded Flooring*', '- Granite Counters*', '- Energy Efficient Appliances', 'Community Amenities', '- Garages Available', '- Online Rental Payments', '- Close proximity to Wing & Lilly Fong Elementary, Irwin and Susan Molasky JHS and Cimarron-Memorial High School', '- Major employers in the area such as MountainView Hospital and the NW Las Vegas Medical District', '- Fitness Center', '- Playground', '- Pool View', '- Pet Friendly*', '- Located by Highway 95, public transportation, Walmart Super Center, and Best of The West Shopping Center', '- Gated Electronic Entrance', '- Theater Room', '- WiFi available in the club house', '- Close Proximity to Parks', '- 4 Swimming Pools and 3 Spas', 'Pet Policy', 'We Love Pets!', 'Breed Restrictions Apply.', 'Office Hours', 'Monday:9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Tuesday:11:00AM-6:00PM', 'Wednesday-Friday:9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday:9:00AM-5:00PM', 'Sunday:10:00AM-5:00PM', 'The Met', '2701 North Rainbow Blvd, Las Vegas, NV, 89108', 'TAqqrKE1lRS']
